summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CryptoVault after main agent fixes. All critical issues resolved successfully. Trading page JavaScript error fixed, health endpoint working, and all core functionality operational.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with gold/orange theme (199 gold elements found)
Trading page loads without JavaScript errors - FIXED
Trading page shows Bitcoin chart with live prices and interactive controls
Trading page cryptocurrency selector working (Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc.)
Trading page time range buttons (1D, 7D, 30D, 90D, 1Y) functional
Markets page displays cryptocurrency list with live CoinGecko prices
Auth pages (signup/login) work correctly with proper form validation
GET /api/crypto returns 9 cryptocurrencies with live prices
POST /api/auth/login returns JWT tokens with email verification requirement
Protected endpoints properly secured (401 for unauthorized)
Frontend responsive design and gold color scheme implemented
TradingChart component using lightweight-charts v5 API correctly - FIXED
Real-time price display and chart interactions working
Buy/Sell trading buttons properly styled and functional
Market statistics (Market Cap, 24h Volume) showing correctly

success_percentage.backend: 90% - All core APIs working, minor CORS configuration issue
success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All pages working, trading functionality fully operational
